title: My Pixel 2's speakers don't work/vibration is minimal
content:
My speakers don't work & the vibration is minimal/weak.I've missed calls & texts b/c of this issue. I'm not going to spend my time staring at the screen so I don't miss anymore calls/texts. That's the whole reason for having a phone with working speakers. 
Please let me know if you can help me with this problem. 
   Thanks,
      Ashley Bonanno
